role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Multipass on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Multipass on nearly any platform. Get an instant Ubuntu VM with a single command. Multipass can launch and run virtual machines and configure them with cloud-init like a public cloud. Prototype your cloud launches locally for free
